title: How do I stop dying so much
body:
https://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-history/NA1/229300205

If you look at my match history for the last bunch of games, you will notice that I usually have a bunch of deaths. I see this as a problem. With me being afraid of being banned for intentional feeding, I could use some tips on how to not die so much.

replies.body: I actually reduced a lot of my deaths when I actively prevent myself from using flash to secure kills and just use it defensively.  I still do it from time to time but it actually helps a ton and most people don't think about it but those 5 mins without it can be a nightmare if the enemy jungler is at all aware of what's happening

In my experience, it’s all about reading the situation and putting yourself over a kill. 

Seeing a full health enemy alone in the jungle, I’ll think “I could probably kill him” but if my own health or mana isn’t that great then I’m needlessly risking myself for example.
look at your map and don't be an idiot.

Simple play tanks, and go tank page  if you don't like dying so much, in fact dying as a sup to get your carrys the kill is worth it and beneficial to the team cause you prob will be worth dirt cheap for no ksing since you do no dmg.
go down a level and play normals blind pick. that's already a clown fiesta and you will fit right in...feeder.
